summary:
YouTube Premium is a paid service that gives you a better experience on YouTube. With it, you can watch videos without ads, download them to your phone or tablet, and even play videos in the background while you do other things. It also includes access to YouTube Music, where you can stream songs and artists.

It started as a music streaming service called Music Key in 2014, but in 2015, it became YouTube Red, offering ad-free videos. In 2018, it was renamed YouTube Premium. Over 100 million people subscribe to it.
title: YouTube Premium
